context:
Let's calculate from scratch the answer to Life, the Universe, and Everything. It won't be surprising if we time out in this case, as it requires a 7.5-million-year long computation.

Yet, if you can provide the answer to the following question, you can drastically reduce the need time to obtain the answer.
name: Deep Thought Simulation

q1.name: Which planet was created in this goal ?
